title: UAE Delivers Tour de France ‘Dream Team’ with Tadej Pogačar, Yates, Ayuso, Almeida
content:
UAE will load up all of its firepower behind Tadej Pogačar after he races the Giro d'Italia for the first time in ambitious calendar with Olympics, worlds also on his docket.

Read the full article at UAE Delivers Tour de France ‘Dream Team’ with Tadej Pogačar, Yates, Ayuso, Almeida on Velo.
author: ahood
